name: Bowl-O-Rama
overview:
This upgrade for Capcom Bowling boards contains three bowling variations:
Bowl-O-Rama: Plays like standard bowling.
Flash-O-Matic: Time strikes and spares to get maximum score multiplier.
BlackJack: Three balls and full racks per frame. Try to get 21 to get 42 points or just get straight points for the number of pins knocked down.
